subject: Enterprise Solution Inquiry
body: Hi, I'm interested in learning more about your enterprise solution. Could we schedule a demo?

subject: Connection Request
body: Thanks for connecting! I'd like to discuss how your solution could help our startup scale.

subject: Follow-up on Demo
body: The demo went great! Our team is very interested. What are the next steps?

subject: Quick Question
body: Hi! Quick question about the pricing structure. Can you send me the details?

subject: Contract Terms Discussion
body: We've reviewed the proposal and have a few questions about the contract terms.

subject: Ready to Move Forward
body: Everything looks good on our end. We're ready to sign the contract!
